title: Type releases, worth noting (July, ‘08).
content:
Selected newly released typefaces/type families and fonts, for the  
month of July, 2008.

Sans: [Enzo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416060111/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_enzo_ot/ "Enzo"), by Tobias Kvant _(FontFont)_.  
Serif: [Pitu](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416060111/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_pitu_ot/ "Pitu"), by Łukasz Dziedzic _(FontFont)_.  
Display: [Lasagna](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416060111/http:/www.re-type.com/fonts/lasagna-regular.html "Lasagna"), by Yomar Augusto _(ReType)_.  
Script: [Pigtail](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416060111/http:/www.dutchfonts.com/pigtail/pigtail.htm "Pigtail"), by Ko Sliggers _(Dutchfonts)_.  
Dingbat: [Ornaments Accolades B](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416060111/http:/www.astype.de/s/astype_orn_acco_b/show.php "Ornaments B"), by Andreas Seidel.  
Hebrew: [Perlmutter](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416060111/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/vic-fieger/perlmutter/ "Perlmutter"), by Vic Fieger.  
Free: [Sniglet](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416060111/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47219 "Sniglet"), by Haley Fiege.

_[for.ma/blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416060111/http:/for.ma/blog)_
author: Dav

comments.content: Glad you found the new FontFonts worthy of mention, David! If your audience is professional typographers I would link to the OpenType versions of [FF Enzo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416060111/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_enzo_ot/) and [FF Pitu](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416060111/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_pitu_ot/).

Thanks, Stephen. I've seen the OT links, and right now I don't/can't really remember why I chose to still link to the 'normal' ones instead. _(I will update those.)_

Dav
